thread.title_full: Anthony Davis Is Giving Away 'Antober' Sneakers

title: Anthony Davis Is Giving Away 'Antober' Sneakers
text:
Anthony Davis Is Giving Away 'Antober' Sneakers 
NBA All-Star has extra kicks that he wants to bless you with. By Mark Lelinwalla Posted: 10/01/2015 02:28 PM EDT Filed Under Sacramento Kings , New Orleans Pelicans , Sports News , sneakers , Sports , Los Angeles Lakers , DeMarcus Cousins , Nick Young , Anthony Davis 
At 22-years-old, Anthony Davis seemingly has the basketball world in the palms of his hands...and he wants to put all his sneakers at the soles of your feet. 
The New Orleans Pelicans ' All-Star power forward took to his Twitter account Thursday to announce 'Antober,' his sneaker giveaway for this entire month. Be clear—The Brow is talking boxes and boxes of free kicks. Got all these extra @nike 's....who wants em? I'll be doing a giveaway per day all month. Stay tuned! #Antober pic.twitter.com/py7S4hLhWH — Anthony Davis (@AntDavis23) October 1, 2015 I'm giving away a pair of my @nike 's every day during #Antober . RT this today for a chance to win the first pair! pic.twitter.com/hM5KnhQ3zw — Anthony Davis (@AntDavis23) October 1, 2015 
In showing his generosity, Davis joins fellow NBA players like Sacramento Kings ' All-Star DeMarcus Cousins and Los Angeles Lakers ' Nick Young who have announced sneaker giveaways through their social media accounts. 
Davis must be in a good mood with the start of the 2015-16 season just over three weeks away. The Brow led the Pelicans to the playoffs and is coming off averaging a ridiculous 24.4 points, 10.2 rebounds and 2.9 blocks per game.
